name: Rising Tides (DaniTheGamer, kendal316)
description:
You're some of the last people on earth, the world is fudged and the water is rising! But you don't really like you friends, and are missing the resources to sustain yourself, so you decide to kill them by drowning them. Pushing them of the worlds biggest scyscraper.. 

  • Daniel Kierkegaard Andersen
  • Irene Arnaiz
  • Kristoffer Frandsen
  • Thomas Møller Grosen
  • Magnus Lønborg
  • Rune Sønder
  • Rian Yu

P1: Arrow keys + comma (dash) and period (attack).
P2: WASD + shift (dash) and ctrl (attack).
Otherwise controller support for supporting 4player gameplay..
